Tak Hadiri RDP DPRD Sumut, Komisi E Akan Laporkan Kadis Kesehatan ke Gubernur
04 Nov 2019, 18:37 by Indra Widyastuti


Tak Hadiri RDP DPRD Sumut, Komisi E Akan Laporkan Kadis Kesehatan ke Gubernur

KBRN, Medan : Komisi E DPRD Sumatera Utara (Sumut) kecewa dengan Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Sumut karena tidak menghadiri undangan rapat kerja dari lembaga legislatif. Komisi yang membidangi masalah kesehatan dan kesejehateraan sosial itu akan menyurati gubernur untuk melaporkan hal tersebut.
“Kita akan koordinasi, diskusi dulu di internal kita Komisi E, apakah kita menyurati atas nama komisi atau atas nama pimpinan DPRD Sumut. Karena semua lagkah-langkah tetap kita koordinasikan ke pimpinan. Tapi yang pasti hari ini mengecewakan hasilnya,” kata Ketua Komisi E, Dimas Triaji usai rapat dengar pendapat (RDP) di gedung DPRD Sumut, Medan, Senin (4/11/2019).
RDP itu merupakan rapat perdana Komisi E dengan mitra kerja komisi, dengan mengundang Dinas Kesehatan, Dinas Sosial dan BPJS Kesehatan Wilayah Sumut dan Aceh. RDP itu membahas permasalahan kesehatan di Sumut, yakni pelayanan kesehatan, jaminan kesehatan nasional di Sumut, dan realisasi anggaran hingga Oktober 2019.
Namun dari tiga instansi yang diundang tersebut, hanya pimpinan BPJS Kesehatan yang hadir, yakni Deputi Direksi Wilayah Sumut Aceh BPJS Kesehatan, Maryamah. Sementara Dinas Kesehatan Sumut Alwi Mujahit Hasibuan hanya diwakili Kepala Bidang Layanan Kesehatan (Yankes), Siti Roilan. Sedangkan Dinsos, datang terlambat saat rapat telah berjalan 1,5 jam sehingga tidak diperkenankan mengikuti rapat.
Komisi E akhirnya menghentikan rapat dan akan dijadwalkan ulang kembali di badan musyawarah. Menurut Dimas, pihaknya tidak mendapatkan informasi alasan ketidakhadiran Kadis Kesehatan Sumut.
“Kita baru tahunya di sini, katanya ke Jakarta. Dinsos hadir tadi cuman 1,5 jam setelah rapat dimulai. Maka kita akan agendakan ulang dan harus dihadiri semua pimpinan OPD,” tegasnya
Menurut Dimas, kehadiran Kepala OPD dalam rapat kerja bersama lembaga legislatif sangat penting karena sebagai penanggungjawab anggaran, kepala OPD dapat mengambil keputusan. Apalagi Ketua DPRD Sumut sudah meminta kepada gubernur dalam rapat paripurna agar dalam setiap rapat dengan dewan, harus dihadiri kepala OPD.
“Kita melihat sebagai penanggungjawab penuh di dinas harusnya beliau hadir supaya tahu permasalahan yang ada. Belum tentu juga dia dengan kabidnya berkomunikasinya baik, makanya kita undang di sini. Apalagi Ketua DPRD sudah meminta ke gubernur dalam rapat paripurna lalu,” pungkasnya.
Sementara Kabid Yankes Dinkes Sumut, Siti Roilan mengaku menghadiri rapat karena Kadis sedang menjalankan tugas di Jakarta.

Not Attending North Sumatra DPRD RDP, Commission E Will Report the Health Cadre to the Governor
Nov 04 2019, 18:37 by Indra Widyastuti


Not Attending North Sumatra DPRD RDP, Commission E Will Report the Health Cadre to the Governor

KBRN, Medan: Commission E North Sumatra DPRD (North Sumatra) was disappointed with the Head of the North Sumatra Health Service for not attending the work meeting invitation from the legislative body. The commission in charge of health and social welfare issues will write to the governor to report the matter.
"We will coordinate, first discuss in our internal Commission E, whether we are writing on behalf of the commission or on behalf of the North Sumatra DPRD leaders. Because all the steps we keep coordinating to the leadership. But what is certain today is the disappointing result, "said Chairman of Commission E, Dimas Triaji after the hearing (RDP) at the North Sumatra DPRD building, Medan, Monday (11/04/2019).
The RDP was the inaugural meeting of Commission E with the commission's working partners, by inviting the Health Service, Social Service and BPJS Health in North Sumatra and Aceh. The RDP discussed health problems in North Sumatra, namely health services, national health insurance in North Sumatra, and the realization of the budget until October 2019.
However, of the three invited institutions, only the leader of BPJS Health was present, namely the Deputy Director of the North Sumatra BPJS Health Region, Maryamah. While the North Sumatra Health Office Alwi Mujahit Hasibuan was only represented by the Head of Health Services (Yankes), Siti Roilan. Whereas Social Affairs, arriving late when the meeting has been running 1.5 hours so it is not allowed to attend the meeting.
Commission E finally stopped the meeting and will be rescheduled again at the deliberative body. According to Dimas, his party did not get information on the reasons for the absence of the North Sumatra Health Office.
"We just found out here, he said to Jakarta. Dinsos was just 1.5 hours after the meeting began. Then we will re-schedule and must be attended by all OPD leaders, "he stressed
According to Dimas, the presence of the Head of the OPD in a working meeting with the legislative body is very important because as the person in charge of the budget, the head of the OPD can make decisions. Moreover, the Chairperson of the North Sumatra DPRD has asked the governor in a plenary meeting so that in every meeting with the council, the head of the Regional Representative Council must attend it.
"We see that as a full person in charge in the office he should be present to know the existing problems. Not necessarily he also with the head of communication is good, so we invite here. Moreover, the Chair of the DPRD has asked the governor in the last plenary meeting, "he concluded.
While Head of North Sumatra Health Office Yankes, Siti Roilan claimed to attend the meeting because Kadis was carrying out duties in Jakarta.
